quote: The shortest distance between two points is a time line, a schedule, a map of your time, the itinerary for the rest of your life.Nothing shows you the straight line from here to death like a list.
quote_letters: THE SHORTEST DISTANCE BETWEEN TWO POINTS IS A TIME LINE A SCHEDULE A MAP OF YOUR TIME THE ITINERARY FOR THE REST OF YOUR LIFENOTHING SHOWS YOU THE STRAIGHT LINE FROM HERE TO DEATH LIKE A LIST
